description: xyAlgebra is designed for middle and high school students, teachers, and other users interested in learning or teaching basic algebra. Since xyAlgebra is freeware, people commonly use it in classroom settings, tutoring environments, and at home for self-paced learning.

The app provides tools and exercises that break down algebraic and verbal math problems into logical steps. PRB files support this functionality by storing predefined probability scenarios or problem templates that the software references during tutoring sessions or quizzes.
